name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CheapCharts - Movie Price Tracker for AppleTV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add movies from Apple TV website to your CheapCharts wishlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CheapCharts is now available as a Chrome extension! Simply log in to your CheapCharts account and effortlessly add movies from various sites directly to your CheapCharts wishlist.

When you’re browsing a movie’s details page on the Apple TV website, just click the CheapCharts extension and hit “Add to Wishlist” – and you’re done! It’s that simple.

What is CheapCharts?
CheapCharts is your go-to tool for finding the best deals on digital content in the iTunes Store and beyond. Whether it’s movies, TV shows, music, or apps, CheapCharts helps you track prices and save money. With its Smart Wishlist feature, you can add items you’re interested in and get notified when their prices drop. No more missing out on great deals – CheapCharts ensures you always buy at the right time!

Check out our website: https://cheapcharts.info
